java -jar ./selenium-server-standalone-2.35.0.jar - Dwebdriver.chrome.driver='/opt/drivers/chromedriver' -role webdriver -hub  http://192.168.1.10:4444/grid/register -port 5566 -browser browserName=chrome,maxInstances=5,platform=LINUX &



java -jar sel-serv.jar - Dwebdriver.chrome.driver='C:/node-auto/node_modules/nightwatch/bin/chromedriver' -role webdriver -hub  http://192.168.1.10:4444/grid/register -port 5566 -browser browserName=chrome,maxInstances=5,platform=LINUX &

java -jar sel-serv.jar  -Dwebdriver.chrome.driver=c:\path\to\chromedriver.exe



java -jar sel-serv.jar  -Dwebdriver.chrome.driver=C:\node-auto\node_modules\nightwatch\bin\chromedriver.exe
